issue.title: [Rust] Remove PrimitiveArrayOps
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10375](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10375). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It is no longer needed, now that we no longer have specialization.
